name: Aeegon Conqueror
description: Aeegon Conqueror was the first of his name, the King of the Andals and the First Men, and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. He was the founder of the House of Targaryen, which ruled the Seven Kingdoms for three centuries until Aegon the Dragon rebelled against his father, King Aegon I Targaryen, and won the throne.
